verbose_text: SLM2 dependent post-synaptic responses and plasticity within CA1 pyramidal neurons can also be rescued by heterozygote deletion of the Neurexin1 AS4 exon, although individual SLM2 regulated exons are likely to have different functional effects.
evidence: SLM2-dependent post-synaptic responses and plasticity within CA1 pyramidal neurons can also be rescued by heterozygote deletion of the Neurexin1 AS4
